subject: p16848073
History: Evaluation of the patient after esophagectomy.
Findings: AP and lateral radiographs of the chest were reviewed in comparison to obtained at 9:34 pm. Right pleural effusion appears to be slightly decreased, although still present. Mediastinal contour is stable. Small amount of left pleural effusion is unchanged. No appreciable pneumothorax is seen.
